column5: Instant book applicable ONLY if you are booking using your OWN Airbnb account.  This is a budget private room, perfect for short-term stay, and solo business traveler. We currently have 2 regular tenants, both working professionals. Bathroom/shower is SHARED. Smoking (cigarettes, cigars, e-cig or medical/recreational cannabis) is NOT allowed, inside the house, outside, or anywhere in the property. If you are a smoker, this place is not for you.
column8: Cost-efficient room for solo business traveler!
